snippet: Several city agencies and the privately funded Gracie Mansion Conservancy split the cost of preparing a home that has not been lived in for years to serve as the de Blasio family’s residence.
abstract: Total spent among city agencies and private donors to install New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and his family into the Gracie Mansion is nearing $145,000.
lead_paragraph: Several city agencies and the privately funded Gracie Mansion Conservancy split the cost of preparing a home that has not been lived in for years to serve as the de Blasio family’s residence.

headline.main: Cost of Putting Mayor’s Family in Gracie Mansion Nears $145,000
headline.print_headline: Cost of Putting Mayor’s Family in New Home Nears $145,000
